title: EASY A321 Button Setup Guide for Velocity One That Actually Works for MSFS2024!
description:
Looking for maximum realism when flying the Airbus A321-LR in Microsoft Flight Simulator? This video provides a step-by-step guide to configuring your VelocityOne Flight System for the A321-LR. We'll cover Yoke and Throttle Quadrant setup, throttle calibration for the A321-LR, and advanced customization options like profiles and virtual buttons.

04:58 - yoke | configuring the ailerons
05:16 - yoke | configuring the rudders

16:35 - yoke | configuring HAT 2: rudder trim
